Literature.Title: A peptide encoded by a highly conserved gene belonging to the genus Streptomyces shows antimicrobial activity against plant pathogens
Literature.Author: Jeon BJ, Yoo N, Kim JD, Choi J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pectobacterium atrosepticum BAA672(no activity data),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum ATCC 39048(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=128µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria Ds1(MIC=256µg/ml),Aspergillus oryzae(no activity data),Alternaria brassicicola(MIC=128µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=128µg/ml),Colletotrichum orbiculare(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici(MIC=32µg/ml),Rhizopus stolonifer var. stolonifer(no activity data)
